title: That’s F*cked Up: Florida’s Don’t Say Gay Bill
description:
Just last month, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis signed the “Parental Rights in Education” bill aka the infamous “Don’t Say Gay” bill. Proponents claim it’s meant to give parents more control over what their children learn in school. Opponents say it’s actually a targeted attack against the LGBTQ+ community. But what does the bill actually say and what are the implications? Tune in to hear Nicole and Alexa break it all down.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
